at least 8-10 glasses of water daily. Dehydration can lead 
to complications such as pre term labour, urinary tract 
infections, and reduced amniotic fluid levels.16 
Hydration needs may vary based on individual factors such 
as activity level and climate. Monitoring urine color and 
frequency can serve as a practical indicator of hydration 
status.17
